GBR_Ireland.title: Reunification of Great Britain and Ireland
GBR_Ireland.desc: After many decades separate, the United Kingdom has finally reconquered the island of Ireland. Northern Ireland has been expanded to cover the whole 32-county nation and the official name of the $$GBR.flag$$ United Kingdom has been changed to reflect this.
IRE_Unification.title: Reunification of Ireland
IRE_Unification.desc: After many decades separate, Northern Ireland has unified with the rest of the Irish nation to form a 32-county republic. Reunification comes, thankfully, with mostly peace. The new Irish constitution guarantees a federal, secular and democratic state.
